alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:32PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Harney County through 630 PM PDT... At 532 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Highway Well Rest Area to near Barton Lake. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Harney Lake, Juniper Mountain, Lynch Gulch and Malheur Refuge Headquarters around 540 PM PDT. Narrows and Wilson Butte around 550 PM PDT. Double O Station and Iron Mountain around 600 PM PDT. Weaver Lake, Freeman Butte, Wrights Point and Stinking Lake around 610 PM PDT. Wagontire around 620 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
